name: B4dcity
body:
### Welcome to B4dcity Project
This is the easiest way to create Spree on Heroku by just click a few button and all done.

### Support
-Please follow existing document: Spree, Heroku and AWS Amazon S3
-Mail me at 1.0@kul.asia
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
